title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1549/84 of 4 June 1984 fixing, for the 1984/85 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1549/84
of 4 June 1984
fixing, for the 1984/85 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The threshold price for broken rice is hereby fixed at 312,21 ECU per tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1984.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 June 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission  // 574,83  // 760,82  // 836,83  //   //   //   //
